descriptions:
['DescriptionBack Yard Real Estate proudly presents this 2BR Townhouse in Al Alandalus Jumeirah Golf Estates. 
PROPERTY DETAILS:
- 2 Bedroom Townhouse
- 1632 sq ft Built Up Area
- 1447 sq ft Plot Area
- Selling Price AED 1,615,000/-
Al Andalus is a gated community with pedestrian friendly streets and a beautiful urban plaza that will give the feeling of being in an Andalusian neighborhood. A central, expertly scaled courtyard, is at the heart of this exclusive, friendly and vibrant community, offering gathering spaces for residents, so anyone can enjoy an easy stroll while the kids play safely. Each townhouse also has a terrace and large bay windows that allow for outdoor living and beautifully reflect the Andalusian way of life.
For the hardscape, paving materials for roads and footpaths are pre-cast, concrete pavers that replicate an Andalusian style paving in shape, texture and color. The softscape includes, Mediterranean plant materials such as Olive and Citrus trees. Each Townhouse unit consists of a two-car, shaded garage and main entrance leading through a spacious entrance lobby to the family room. This opens to the rear private garden, through full height doors, that flood natural light into the room and make indoor and outdoor living seamless. The kitchen, fitted with detailed elegant cupboards including breakfast nook, is the heart of the home.
Wet areas such as kitchens, laundry and bathrooms have proper waterproof coatings from floor and walls to all exposed roofs. Each have thermal and moisture protection systems.
For more details, please call Jelan @ +971505698588 or reach us @ +97145197666']

descriptions: ['Description*Unique /Rare Unit*D&B Properties are pleased to offer for sale this beautiful 3 bed apartment in Sunrise Bay T1, Emaar Beach Front, Dubai.\xa0* Selling Price: AED 3,900,000* BUA : 1,909 Square Feet* Property will be ready by 2021* 3 bedroom with en-suite bathrooms* Easy access to Sheikh Zayed Road* All residents have direct access to the beach* Only a few steps away from the bay & marina* Ready access to several retail & healthcare facilities at the ground level* The overall design was inspired by modern yachting culture & loft style livingCall Khalid our expert today for more info +971554537555 | 800DANDB | www.dandbdubai.comSunrise Bay will have easy access to the beaches, marinas, yacht clubs, malls & dining venues of the Marina & surrounding neighborhoods.D&B Properties is a leading real estate company in the International Off-Plan market incl London, Dubai & Abu Dhabi.']

Description:
Burj Daman is a mixed use development project located within the Dubai International Financial Center ( DIFC ) comprising of high end and luxurious residential and commercial towers as well as a number of world class hotels.It is accessible from major road networks including Sheikh Zayed Road, Al Khail Road and with the new Downtown bypass tunnel which is now open. Bus stops are also located adjacent to the building and the Financial Centre Metro station is just walking distance as well.
Fidu Properties is one of the most innovative and leading real estate agency in Dubai, we provide our clients a wide range of services, providing relevant and reliable information for residential, commercial and off plan properties.
You can contact us at +971525999999 for any enquiry.']

descriptions: ['DescriptionHAWKINS REAL ESTATE is pleased to offer this new to the market golf course backing 4 Bedroom Townhouse over 3 floors in the heart of Al Hamra Village.- Beautifully maintained\xa0- Option to buy furnished or unfurnished- Mature garden with plants and flowers- 3 floors with large terrace- Additional room on 4th floor and storage - Roof terrace with stunning views of the golf course and lagoon\xa0- Under cover parking area with garage door- Lots of outside parking 2% Agent fees2% Transfer feesAED\xa014,175 Annual service fee Viewing highly recommended.Call Darren on +971562543720 for more information, to arrange a viewing or to make an offer.\xa0Alternatively visit our website www.hredubai.com where you will find our full selection of properties available both for sale and rent.Finance or payment plans may be available on this property through HAWKINS Real Estate partners.
